column2: IDEABKL-1141 Allow plugins to use FoldingListener

column3: Please don't move classes between packages.

I've looked at the code and there is really nothing to fix there at this point. The distinction between OpenAPI and non-OpenAPI classes is immaterial at this point, and there is nothing that prevents plugins from using the FoldingModelEx interface.
IDEABKL-1141 Allow plugins to use FoldingListener
